enter: Here I come, rougher than the rest of them!
Knock knock, it's Knuckles the bloat thrower!
This is Knuckles, and I'm back!
You know me, the fighting freak Knuckles!
This is Knuckles, who fears none.
Everybody flow with me, this is your boy Knuckles.
Hey guys! Long time no see.
exit: Something's callin' me more and more...
Something's callin' me more and more...
Something's callin' me more and more...
Something's callin' me more and more...
help:
[To perform a command, prefix it with `/knux ` (for example, `/knux jam`)]
[Prefix it with `/knux help ` to get info on the command (type just `/knux help` to display this post.)]
[**PHRASE COMMANDS:** `knux, enter, brag, threat, accept, decline, about, memory, jam`]
[**OTHER COMMANDS:** `and, avatar, ping, react, learn, setgame ___, say ___, reveal, tts, delcmd`]
[**MOD-ONLY COMMANDS:** `channel ___, error, authorize ___, shutdown`]

helpcmd.knux:
[`/knux knux`:]
[Discover the true meaning of life.]
helpcmd.enter:
[`/knux brag`:]
[Listen to some of my world-famous greetings.]
helpcmd.brag:
[`/knux brag`:]
[True facts about how great I am.]
helpcmd.threat:
[`/knux threat`:]
[you wanna go pal, you want some of this]
helpcmd.accept:
[`/knux accept`:]
[Take the illusion of free will and smash it with a hammer.]
helpcmd.decline:
[`/knux decline`:]
[I refuse to tell you what this command does.]
helpcmd.about:
[`/knux about`:]
[Now this is a story all about how my life got flipped turned upside down and I'd like to take a minute just sit right there and I'll tell you how friggin' awesome I am]
helpcmd.memory:
[`/knux memory`:]
[Causes me to revisit some fond memories.]
helpcmd.react:
[`/knux react`:]
[Gives me the okay to vandalize your post with gestures of varying politeness.]
helpcmd.learn:
[`/knux learn`:]
[Refreshes my responses from the host's local JSON data.]
helpcmd.say:
[`/knux say ___`:]
[Forces me to say stuff.  Use common sense with this command.]
helpcmd.reveal:
[`/knux reveal`:]
[Reveals the name of the last person to use my say command.]
helpcmd.tts:
[`/knux tts`:]
[Toggles whether my posts can be read by Discord's text to speech.]
helpcmd.delcmd:
[`/knux delcmd`:]
[Toggles whether I delete every message with a valid command.]
helpcmd.channel:
[`/knux channel ___`:]
[Toggles whether I can post in a given channel.  You must specify a valid channel name.]
helpcmd.authorize:
[`/knux authorize ___`:]
[Gives a user permission to use my mod-only commands.  You must specify a valid username of someone on the server.]

precious: PRECIOUS PLACEHOLDER; I'll have more responses here eventually

brag: Tougher than leather.
Won't be frightened, I'll stand up to all the pain and turmoil
I am fighting my own mission, nothing's gonna stand in my way.
I break 'em down whether they solid or frail!
I have no such things as weak spots!
Unlike Sonic I don't chuckle.
My philosophy's my knuckles and feet!
My spikes go through boulders.
I was born by myself, I don't need a posse.
No one stops Knuckles' feet!
Call me stubborn but I'm still gonna live it!
I was born like this, to fear no one.

You'll never see me run and I won't surrender!
I just fire away like no other contender.
I get this power to wipe out the havoc and anarchy.
I stay on point like every single day

I stay knuckled up, I'm in a deep cut.
They don't call me Knuckles for nothing, I can't lose.
